text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>5. Bey Herrn Daniel Eckenstein dem Buchdrucker in der Eschemer-Vorstatt sind folgende Bücher zu haben: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Dr. Johann Rambach</AUTHOR> <TITLE>erbauliches Hand-Büchlein für Kinder</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann Arndt</AUTHOR> <TITLE>sechs Geistreiche Bücher vom wahren Christenthum</TITLE></BIBL>; Item <BIBL><AUTHOR>derselben</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Geistreiches Paradys-Gärtlein</TITLE> in <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><AUTHOR>Johann-Bühner</AUTHOR> <TITLE>zweymahl zwey und fünffzig auserlesene Biblische Historien aus dem alten und neuen Testament</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>Der Gnaden-Schlüssel aller Kinderen GOttes</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL>. <BIBL><TITLE>die Weege und Wercke GOttes in der Seele</TITLE> in <FORMAT>12mo</FORMAT></BIBL>. Item: <BIBL><TITLE>Ubungen sich stets in der Gegenwart GOttes zu halten</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT></BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":7,"explanation":"1. Fixed malformed Unicode characters (e.g., 'B\u001a\fher' to 'Bücher', 'Hand-B\u001a\fhlein' to 'Hand-Büchlein', etc.). 2. Corrected '8v\u001a\u00064' to '8vo' and similar format tags. 3. Added missing <AUTHOR> tag for the third BIBL entry ('Johann-H\u001a\u000bner' to 'Johann-Bühner'). 4. Added missing <AUTHOR> tag for the 'derselben' entry. 5. Removed extraneous comma in the last BIBL entry and placed <FORMAT> inside <BIBL>. 6. Ensured all <BIBL> tags are properly closed and nested. 7. Removed stray 'Item' outside of <BIBL> tags and placed it as text where appropriate."}
